title: Awareness Training Microlearning for Strengthening Decision-Making Competencies of Science Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Over 5 years of practical experience in science fields, understanding of specialized terminology, and basic problem-solving skills
context.additional_context: Decision-making training emphasizing field applicability conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can recognize core features of dynamic situations in science labs/fieldwork with ≥80% accuracy within 5 seconds
Learners achieve ≥90% decision-making accuracy in real-world scenarios resembling training scenarios
Learners demonstrate 30% improved decision-making efficiency in project-based assessments within 6 months compared to baseline

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
